TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Grid extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Grid Inherits Panel Implements IAddChild
public ref class Grid : System::Windows::Controls::Panel, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type Grid = class inherit Panel interface IAddChild

summary.span: 定義彈性的格線區域，由欄與列組成。

span.span: Defines a flexible grid area that consists of columns and rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含的集合中的物件屬性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 資料行和資料列內所定義的可以充分善用調整大小以按比例分配剩餘的空間。Columns and rows that are defined within a can take advantage of sizing to distribute remaining space proportionally. 當當做的高度或寬度的資料列或資料行，資料行或資料列，都會收到剩餘的可用空間的加權的比例。When is selected as the height or width of a row or column, that column or row receives a weighted proportion of the remaining available space. 這是相對於，這會平均為基礎的資料行或資料列內的內容大小的空間。This is in contrast to , which distributes space evenly based on the size of the content that is within a column or row. 這個值會以`*`或是`2*`當您使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This value is expressed as `*` or `2*` when you use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 在第一個案例中，資料列或資料行，則會收到一倍的可用空間，而第二個案例中，資料列或資料行接收兩倍的可用空間，依此類推。In the first case, the row or column would receive one times the available space, while in the second case, the row or column would receive two times the available space, and so on. 藉由結合這項技術來按比例分配使用的空間並的值`Stretch`，就能夠依螢幕空間的百分比的資料分割配置空間。By combining this technique to proportionally distribute space with a and value of `Stretch`, it is possible to partition layout space by percentage of screen space. 是唯一的版面配置面板可以發佈這種方式中的空間。 is the only layout panel that can distribute space in this manner. 根據預設，資料列和資料行最多需要最少的空間來容納的最大的內容中的給定資料列或資料行包含任何資料格內所需。By default, rows and columns take up the least amount of space necessary to accommodate the largest content within any cell contained in a given row or column. 例如，如果資料行具有與長文字的一個資料格，像"河馬 」 它，但所有其他資料格資料行中包含具有較小的字詞，像"dog"，資料行寬度會 （河馬） 的最大文字寬度。For example, if a column has one cell with a long word like "hippopotamus" contained within it but all the other cells in the column have smaller words like "dog", the width of the column will be the width of the largest word (hippopotamus). 您可以精確定位子項目的所使用的組合屬性和對齊屬性。You can precisely position child elements of a by using a combination of the property and alignment properties. 子項目的繪製標記或程式碼中出現的順序。Child elements of a are drawn in the order in which they appear in markup or code. 如此一來，當項目共用相同的座標，可以達到分層的順序 （也稱為疊置順序）。As a consequence, layered order (also known as z-order) can be achieved when elements share the same coordinates. 和共用一些通用的功能，但每個可以套用在適當的情況下，更有效地使用內建的功能。 and share some common functionality, but each can be applied in appropriate scenarios to better use its built-in features. 將資料列和資料行的索引; 為基礎的項目則否。 adds elements based on a row and column index; does not. 項目可讓分層的內容，可以在單一儲存格內存在於多個項目。The element allows layering of content, where more than one element can exist within a single cell. 不支援分層。 does not support layering. 子項目的可以絕對位置相對於其 「 儲存格 」 界限左上角。Child elements of a can be absolutely positioned relative to the upper-left corner of their "cell" boundaries. 不支援這項功能。 does not support this feature. 也提供更彈性的調整大小行為比。 also offers more flexible resizing behavior than . 會使用物件來定義的調整大小特性或。 uses the object to define the sizing characteristics of a or . 如需每個單位類型的定義，請參閱。For a definition of each unit type, see . 如果要將子項目新增至中的資料行，，資料行其屬性設定為`Auto`，子系的度量而沒有任何限制。If a child element is added to a column within a , and the column has its property set to `Auto`, the child will be measured without restrictions. 此行為可避免水平捲軸顯示如果正在使用中，測量子項目，是為未繫結。This behavior can prevent horizontal scroll bars from displaying if a is being used, as the child element is measured as unbounded. 基於顯示的詳細資訊，子系會裁剪而非捲動。For purposes of display, the child is clipped rather than scrolled. 面板項目不會接收焦點的預設值。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要有興趣接收焦點的面板項目，設定屬性設`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立方格。The following example demonstrates how to create a grid. 在此情況下，方格會定義三個項目和四個裝載子內容的項目。In this case, the grid defines three elements and four elements that host child content. [!code-csharp[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/CSharp/Grid_Code.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/VisualBasic/grid_vb.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/XAML/default.xaml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行和參與共用大小的資料列不遵守調整大小。Columns and rows participating in size sharing do not respect sizing. 在此案例中，調整大小會被視為。In this scenario, sizing is treated as . 如果方格大小共用不會無法運作設為`true`資源範本內和定義該範本之外。Grid size sharing does not work if is set to `true` within a resource template, and a is defined outside of that template. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和程式碼。The following code examples demonstrate how to use the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xml[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] ...... The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用格線建立內的所有項目周圍加上虛線。Enabling grid lines creates dotted lines around all the elements within a . 只有虛線可用，因為這個屬性是做為設計工具來偵錯的版面配置問題，因此不適合在生產環境品質的程式碼中使用。Only dotted lines are available because this property is intended as a design tool to debug layout problems and is not intended for use in production quality code. 如果您想要內，在項目設定樣式有框線。If you want lines inside a , style the elements within the to have borders. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddChild(object value) cil managed
Sub AddChild (value As Object) Implements IAddChild.AddChild

param.name: value
param.span: 要加入做為子系的物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法呼叫期間不得修改視覺化樹狀結構。The visual tree must not be modified during a call to this method.
